subject: Re: Order #SSN1859 confirmed
description_text:
Hi Simsonn

I have just tried and not been able to get these haptics to work. I have
upgraded to the latest firmware (SIMSONNManager-2.1.0) and ensured
everything is properly connected.

Please advise if these pedals are not compatible with the control box you
previously sold me or what the issue may be?

regards,
Vince

conversations.body_text: The Pro X I bought is a transitional model. I'm wondering if I should ask them to upgrade the firmware or send a replacement.

Hi Vincent Paver,    Please press the recovery button on the main control box and reconnect the USB cable. The software will then enter recovery mode. Next, go to Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals and select the prox.sfu file to perform the upgrade.  After the upgrade:    Reconnect the USB cable first;    Then plug in the motor power supply.    Finally, please confirm that the version numbers are displayed as: CPU1: 2.0.3, CPU2: 2.0.2.

working now - thanks!

On Mon, Sep 1, 2025 at 5:36 PM service @simsonn.com
